modules.description: This module manipulates OCaml patterns and expressions during PPX rewriting. It provides operations to rename or remove pattern variables, project variables from value bindings, and construct indexed match expressions with customizable destructuring and switching logic. It works directly with `Ppxlib` types such as `pattern`, `expression`, `value_binding`, and `case`, making it suitable for implementing pattern-based language extensions or transformations. Use cases include rewriting pattern matches to support indexed variables, filtering or transforming specific patterns in a syntax extension, and generating optimized match expressions from high-level constructs.
